definitions.definition: An intensely bitter herb ( Artemisia absinthium and similar plants in genus Artemisia ) used in medicine, in the production of absinthe and vermouth , and as a tonic.
Something that causes bitterness or affliction ; a cause of mortification or vexation.

main_definition: An intensely bitter herb ( Artemisia absinthium and similar plants in genus Artemisia ) used in medicine, in the production of absinthe and vermouth , and as a tonic.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Something that causes bitterness or affliction ; a cause of mortification or vexation.
